data.content: 访问 https://www.python.org 并提取所有链接，然后对页面进行截图

{"url": "https://www.python.org", "links_count": 222, "links": [{"href": "https://www.python.org/#content", "text": "Skip to content"}, {"href": "https://www.python.org/#python-network", "text": "▼ Close"}, {"href": "https://www.python.org/", "text": "Python"}, {"href": "https://www.python.org/psf/", "text": "PSF"}, {"href": "https://docs.python.org/", "text": "Docs"}, {"href": "https://pypi.org/", "text": "PyPI"}, {"href": "https://www.python.org/jobs/", "text": "Jobs"}, {"href": "https://www.python.org/community/", "text": "Community"}, {"href": "https://www.python.org/#top", "text": "▲ The Python Network"}, {"href": "https://www.python.org/", "text": ""}, {"href": "https://donate.python.org/", "text": "Donate"}, {"href": "https://www.python.org/#site-map", "text": "≡ Menu"}, {"href": "https://www.python.org/#", "text": "A A"}, {"href": "javascript:;", "text": "Smaller"}, {"href": "javascript:;", "text": "Larger"}, {"href": "javascript:;", "text": "Reset"}, {"href": "https://www.python.org/#", "text": "Socialize"}, {"href": "https://www.linkedin.com/company/python-software-foundation/", "text": "LinkedIn"}, {"href": "https://fosstodon.org/@ThePSF", "text": "Mastodon"}, {"href": "https://www.python.org/community/irc/", "text": "Chat on IRC"}]}
data.name: extract_links

data.content:
我已成功访问了 https://www.python.org 并完成了以下操作：

1. **提取所有链接**：  
   共提取了 222 个链接。以下是部分示例链接：
   - [Skip to content](https://www.python.org/#content)
   - [Python](https://www.python.org/)
   - [PSF](https://www.python.org/psf/)
   - [Docs](https://docs.python.org/)
   - [PyPI](https://pypi.org/)

2. **页面截图**：  
   截图已保存至以下路径：  
   `/Users/admins/work/czl/agent-python/openai/screenshot_1766992897.png`

如果需要完整链接列表或进一步操作，请告诉我！
